about_me.des: I am a front-end developer from Ireland, living in Portugal. I specialise in front-end web development, in particular HTML/CSS, Javascript and jQuery. I work for the eCommerce platform Shopify where I work as a theme specialist for Plus+. Life is a continuous learning process, so work makes me more rigorous, travel makes my life more colorful.

projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It's pretty minimal, but leverages large type and drastic contrast to make a statement, on all devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.

career.shopify-plus_des: I currently work for the eCommerce platform Shopify, as a theme specialist for the Plus+ department. Shopify Plus+ is an enterprise level eCommerce solutions for emerging brands and high-volume businesses.
career.shopify_des: Working on merchant customisations requests for Shopify.
career.ha_des: At H&A I worked as a web developer, the majority of the work was revolved around front end development creating themes for CMS made simple, Workpress and Opencart, as well as developing Facebook Apps and coporate email stationary and newsletters.
career.chalet-experience_des: At the chalet experience I was in charge of designing and developing a number of ski holiday based websites. The majority of the sites were developed using Drupal CMS.
career.college_des: In August 2011 I graduated from NUI Galway, with a second class honours degree in Digital Media.
